title: nf-core/airrflow pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample_id.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

subject_id.errorMessage: Subject name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

species.errorMessage: Species name must be provided and must be one of: mouse, human

pcr_target_locus.errorMessage: PCR target locus must be provided and must be one of: TR, IG

tissue.errorMessage: Tissue name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

biomaterial_provider.errorMessage: Biomaterial provider must be provided and cannot contain spaces

single_cell.errorMessage: Single cell must be provided as a TRUE/FALSE value
